Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Porto and Amsterdam, Munich and Amsterdam, Reykjavik and Amsterdam, Munich and Porto, Prague and Reykjavik, Reykjavik and Munich, Amsterdam and Santorini, Prague and Amsterdam, Prague and Munich.
